verbs.description: WASHINGTON-- President Donald Trump [V: has] commuted the sentence of Alice Marie Johnson , a first - time nonviolent drug offender , two White House officials told CNN , a week after Kim Kardashian West pleaded her case during an Oval Office meeting with Trump . Johnson has already served 21 years of a life sentence after she was convicted on charges of conspiracy to possess cocaine and attempted possession of cocaine , according to the nonprofit Can - Do , which advocates for clemency for non - violent drug offenders .
